name: aeroflow
description: Truly lazily computed reactive data flows with rich set of pure functional operators.
keywords: functional, reactive, async, fluent, FRP, LINQ, ES2015
author: Denis Vlassenko <denis_vlassenko@epam.com>

scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run validate && npm run build && npm run test && npm run document
scripts.build: npm run build:library && npm run build:tests
scripts.build:library: npm run concatenate:library && npm run transpile:library && npm run minify:library
scripts.build:tests: npm run concatenate:tests && npm run transpile:tests
scripts.concatenate: npm run concatenate:library && npm run concatenate:tests
scripts.concatenate:library: rollup --input source/index.js --output build/modern/aeroflow.js && rollup --format umd --input build/modern/aeroflow.js --name aeroflow --output build/modern/aeroflow.umd.js
scripts.concatenate:tests: rollup --format umd --input tests/index.js --name aeroflowTests --output build/modern/aeroflow.tests.js && rollup --input build/modern/aeroflow.tests.js --output build/modern/aeroflow.tests.umd.js
scripts.document: npm run document:library && npm run document:tests
scripts.document:library: jsdoc2md source/**/*.js > documentation/readme.md --global-index-format dl --member-index-format grouped --module-index-format dl --param-list-format list --property-list-format list --sort-by name
scripts.document:tests: mocha test.js --compilers babel:babel-core/register --reporter markdown --require core-js > specifications/readme.md
scripts.test: npm run test:library && npm run test:coverage
scripts.test:coverage: babel-node node_modules/isparta/bin/isparta cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- test.js --reporter dot
scripts.transpile: npm run transpile:library && npm run transpile:tests
scripts.validate: npm run validate:library && npm run validate:tests
